name: Flipp (KingTide44)
description:
An energetic, difficult and creative 2d platformer, with gravity shifting mechanics, where you go "*under* the *world*".

It was made for Godot Wild Jam 9. The theme was "Underworld", so I took a shot at a creative 2d platformer. I ended up liking it so much that I'm now going to develop it into a full game, after the jam is done! Look forward to that. It'll be on my itch.io as well ;).

CONTROLS:
AD / Left-Right / Left Joystick: Movement
W / SpaceBar / B / Circle / A / Up: Jump
R / Select / -: Reset
Esc / Start / +: Exit to menu

Best of luck.

-Samuel Clarke
